casebody.data:
Marc WIERSUM, petitioner,
v.
U.S. BANK, N.A. No. 15-463. Supreme Court of the United States April 18, 2016.

Motion of National Employment Lawyers Association, Florida Chapter for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Eleventh Circuit denied.
